item.title: TF-Federated
item.description: TOWARDS FEDERATED LEARNING AT SCALE: SYSTEM DESIGN # Paper link. This is a really nice comic about federated learning. FL focuses on synchronous approaches. This system enables one to train a deep neural network, using TensorFlow, on data stored on the phone which will never leave the device. Federated-learning protocol: Devices announce to the server that they are ready to run an FL task for a given FL population. An FL population is specified by a globally unique name which identifies the learning problem, or application, which is worked upon.
